name: prodvana
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing Prodvana cloud resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`prodvana` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/prodvana/terraform-provider-prodvana).

nodejs.packageDescription: A Pulumi package for creating and managing Prodvana cloud resources.
nodejs.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/prodvana/terraform-provider-prodvana)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-prodvana` repo](https://github.com/prodvana/pulumi-prodvana/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-prodvana` repo](https://github.com/prodvana/terraform-provider-prodvana/issues).

python.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/prodvana/terraform-provider-prodvana)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-prodvana` repo](https://github.com/prodvana/pulumi-prodvana/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-prodvana` repo](https://github.com/prodvana/terraform-provider-prodvana/issues).

apiToken.description: An API token generated with permissions to this organization.

orgSlug.description: Prodvana organization to authenticate with (you can find this in your Org's url: <org>.prodvana.io)

apiVersion.description: API version of the exec credential plugin

args.description: Arguments to pass when executing the command

env.description: Environment variables to set when executing the command

defaultEnv.description: default environment variables for services in this Release Channel

ecsPrefix.description: Prefix used when naming ECS resources. Can only be set on an ECS Runtime.

k8sNamespace.description: Optionally set a custom namespace. If not set, Prodvana will create and manage the namespace. If set, the namespace *must* already exist and Prodvana will not try to create or delete it. Can only be set on a Kubernetes Runtime.

name.description: optional identifier for this runtime connection within this release channel

type.description: type of the runtime connection, one of (EXTENSION, LONG*LIVED*COMPUTE, UNKNOWN_CONNECTION)

defaultEnv.description: default environment variables for services in this Release Channel

name.description: optional identifier for this runtime connection within this release channel

type.description: type of the runtime connection, one of (EXTENSION, LONG*LIVED*COMPUTE, UNKNOWN_CONNECTION)

provider.description:
The provider type for the prodvana package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Application resources.

agentApiToken.description: API Token used for linking the Kubernetes Prodvana agent

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering K8sRuntime resources.

agentApiToken.description: API Token used for linking the Kubernetes Prodvana agent

agentEnv.description: Environment variables to pass to the agent. Useful for cases like passing proxy configuration to the agent if needed.

agentRuntimeId.description: The runtime identifier of the agent

clientCertificate.description: PEM-encoded client certificate for TLS authentication.

clientKey.description: PEM-encoded client certificate key for TLS authentication.

clusterCaCertificate.description: PEM-encoded root certificates bundle for TLS authentication.

configContext.description: Context to use from the kube config file.

configContextAuthInfo.description: Authentication info context of the kube config (name of the kubeconfig user, `--user` flag in `kubectl`).

configContextCluster.description: Cluster context of the kube config (name of the kubeconfig cluster, `--cluster` flag in `kubectl`).

configPath.description: Path to the kube config file.

configPaths.description: A list of paths to kube config files.

exec.description: Exec configuration for authentication to the Kubernetes cluster

host.description: The address of the Kubernetes cluster (scheme://hostname:port)

insecure.description: Whether server should be accessed without verifying the TLS certificate

password.description: Password for basic authentication to the Kubernetes cluster

proxyUrl.description: Proxy URL to use when accessing the Kubernetes cluster

timeout.description: How long to wait for the runtime linking to complete. A valid Go duration string, e.g. `10m` or `1h`. Defaults to `10m`

tlsServerName.description: Server name passed to the server for SNI and is used in the client to check server certificates against

token.description: Token to authenticate an service account

username.description: Username for basic authentication to the Kubernetes cluster
